author: Staff Reporter
text:
Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises (MSME) DI, Chennai will organise an exhibition on 24 and 25 February at Kamarajar Arangam, Teynampet, according to a press release.

In the exhibition that will be held from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m., members from small scale industries will display their products.

The entry for the exhibition is free, the release added. For details, visit:www.msmedi-chennai.gov.in
title: MSMEs to hold exhibition in city
